messages.1: Is this what's called a beginner's luck?
messages.2: Good job! That was a 50/50 chance!
messages.4: Close call. I'll give you a point for not giving up!

messages.1: Amazing! You got it right on your first try.
messages.2: Great job! You're getting better at this game!

messages.1: Impossible? More like I'm possible. ba dum tss..
messages.3: You've worked so hard for this. Congrats!

messages.1: Holy shit! You totally nailed it!
messages.2: Well done! The satisfaction of doing your best is a great reward!
messages.3: You are proof that good things come to those who are willing to sacrifice to reach a worthwhile goal!

messages.1: YOU CHEATING SON OF A BITCH!!!
messages.2: Y soy rebelde, cuando estás ganando!
messages.3: That wasn't even a hint... Ugh...
